summary: This mod adds a custom textured giant named \"Papa Smurf\" to the game. He is located in Riverwood.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a custom textured giant named \"Papa Smurf\" to the game. He is located in Riverwood.

If you enjoy this mod, or any of the other mods on the nexus, please endorse them, they deserve it!

Check out my other mods: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4831711/?tb=mods&pUp=1]My Mods[/url]

Please check out my other mods on my profile, I hope you enjoy!
author: billmineface
